    • Constructor Detail

      • Projectile

        public Projectile(App app,
                  Tank tank,
                  float xCoordinate,
                  float yCoordinate,
                  float angle,
                  float power,
                  float diameter,
                  int[] colourScheme)
        Constructor for Projectile class. Handles the motion of the projectile and its explosion.
        Parameters:
        app - is the App object that we will pass through to allow for drawing + more implementations of the PApplet library.
        tank - is the Tank object that a Projectile object shoots from.
        xCoordinate - is the x-coordinate of the projectile at every frame.
        yCoordinate - is the y-coordinate of the projectile at every frame.
        angle - is the angle of the turret, which updates when the UP and DOWN keys are pressed.
        power - is the power. This is the same power that is in a player's HealthPower object.
        diameter - is the diameter of the projectile.
        colourScheme - is the colour scheme of the player who is shooting the projectile.

      • expandExplosion

        public void expandExplosion()
        Expands the explosion by 30 pixels over 0.2 seconds, i.e. 5 pixels per frame.
